message: That crap has been said for hundreds of years. Please drop the illusion. Santa Claus is coming later this month. Do you believe that as well?

His war on the US would not be what you think folks. Have you all heard of EMP's?! He has a stockpile if long range missiles equipped to use EMP's, NOT NUKES! Imagine what not having ANYTHING electric would do to us, a country that is DEPENDENT on electricity!!! Only a hand full would know or know how to survive such an attack. It works throw us back into the Stone Age and I guarantee you WE ARE not ready for that!!

Hey, I just want to say this whole Northeastern was a joke. It's called a economy booster. Everyone goes crazy spending all types of money to be careful and protect their families but it's all a hoax from the media made by the government. I myself spent 150$ on last minute items, food etc.. With gas prices plummeting this was a jumpstart to kick the fiscal into overdrive. All weatherman should really consider a new line of work. You guys really are a joke. You play with people's lives. Rant over.
